content.description: Sit start with a good left hand sidepull and a hidden undercling slot just below it. Pull on and move out right to a set of diagonal slopers. Make a series of hard moves up the slopers and snag the higher left hand sidepull or match the slopers then punch for the lip.
content.protection: 3 pads. The landing is flat but slightly angles downhill so the pads may slide.
content.location: This climb is found on the right side of the Iron Boulder. It is located a few feet left of the arete.

content.description: Sit start on two decent jugs, work your way up some crimps and slap up the sloper rail to a decent crimp rail, big move out left to a fat jug, then pull around left to top out. Somewhere between V2 and V4ish
content.location: left side of the boulder, you will see the prominent jug sticking out.

content.description: Sit down start the right arete with a right hand crystal sloper knob. Left hand is on good sidepull-undercling rail on the overhang. Find some feet, pull on and fire up to an interesting hold on the arete. Smack a sloper, then continue moving up the arete with some full body tension until the holds start to improve ad you can jump to a jug. Top out on good meat-wraps.
content.protection: 2-3 pads. Landing is flat for the crux but starts to slant more towards the top.
content.location: This problem is found on the right arete of the tall overhanging face. It shares the top with "The Knight in Screaming Armor".

pathTokens: Boulders Behind the Main Parking Lot/Visitor Center

content.description: The boulder across from chickenhead boulder, and above the new world area with backwards reflector. Not sure if this boulder has been climbed or has been shared already, but i figured id put it up anyway. I called it the iron boulder because it kind of looks like a steam iron.
